pageProduct.name: Reef Dry Oil SPF30 125ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

About Reef Oils

Originally launched in the 1970's, Reef is one of Australia's most iconic sun care brands, known for its famous coconut scented oils and carefree, fun nature. Reef now offers a range of suncare products infused with our signature coconut scent, from Sun Tan Oils, Sunscreen Oils to Sunscreen Lotions!

Reef Oil Range

Reef is Australia's leading* sunscreen oil brand.

Reef complies with the Hawaii Reef Bill to help care for our coral reefs.

Reef is proudly Australian made for the Australian Sun.

Scented with the smell of summer - Reef's delicious signature coconut fragrance.

Now with a range of HIGH SPF PRODUCTS.

The ultra-moisturising oil formulations glide on, are fast drying, and absorb quickly, leaving skin feeling hydrated, soft and supple.

The entire Reef range is formulated to be free from oxybenzone and other ingredients excluded under the current Hawaii Reef Bill.

All Reef products are formulated using cruelty free ingredients.

*Australia Grocery Pharmacy Dollars (000s) MAT 04/07/21

General Information

Reef Dry Sunscreen Oil Coconut SPF 30 gives high protection from the harmful effects of UV rays.

Reef Dry Sun Tan Oil gives broad spectrum protection from the harmful effects of UV rays. The dry oil formulation glides on, is fast drying, and absorbs quickly to leave skin feeling moisturised.

Size: 125mL

Scent: Coconut

SPF: 30

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane 10mg/g, Octocrylene 80mg/g, 4-Methylbenzylidene Camphor 40mg/g, Octyl Methoxycinnamate 100mg/g.

Contains: Propyl Hydroxybenzoate

Directions

Shake well before use. Apply liberally and evenly to all unprotected areas 15 to 20 minutes before exposure to the sun. Reapply after swimming, exercise or towelling.

USAGE ADVICE

Sun Safety: Avoid prolonged exposure to the sun. Always wear a hat, protective clothing and sunglasses. Never expose babies under six months to the sun. For external use only. Keep out of eyes. Avoid contact with fabrics.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.
